answers.author: Barry Crook
answers.text:
I've attached two documents: (1) the form we used at the Washington Dept of Licensing for managers and supervisors; and (2) an excel version of the online form we use here at the City of Aspen. In both cases the employee and the person being evaluated would conduct the assessment prior to sitting down and talking - the supervisor could compare his/her assessment against the self-assessment. We would also use 360 evaluations from peers, other managers/supervisor and those employees the person being reviewed had worked with. Looks like you can only upload one document at a time, so I'll post again with the other document.

author: Brian Heck
text:
Good afternoon,
I am assisting a neighboring city in revising their performance appraisal document.  I am looking for sample forms other communities use. In talking to the city, they are interested in encouraging more interaction/participation by the employee in the process.
title: Employee Performance Appraisal forms
